title: What are the pros and cons of technology transfer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kozma Prutkov once wrote: If ever asked: What's more useful, the sun or the moon, respond: The new moon. For the sun only shines during daytime, when it's light anuway, whereas the Moon shines at night. But, on the other hand, the Sun is better in that it shines and also warms, whereas the Moon only shines; and that only on moonlit evenings! I am afraid this question is from this type of questions...:) Technology transfer is mandated by Bay-Dole law (in US) and is behind lots of our products and innovation. Without it we can hardly use many important results of scientific research. On the other hand, for pure scientists it sometimes prevents quick publishing and is considered as a barrier.
